1578897161856880640.name: Proton.Kiwi
1578897161856880640.content:
Skips the entire process of "I need BNB"

1. Onboard $ to Binance
2. Get BNB
3. Copy the wallet address to send BNB to (pain)
4. Select BSC blockchain to send on (pain)
5. Binance 2 step verification to send (pain)
6. Await Binance to send

So many pain points for noobs to crypto
